title: FarmAnimals1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
We have successfully migrated all of our products to Epic Games' upcoming "Fab" marketplace! You will find the same products there, with no difference in price between personal and professional (pro) licenses. All of our products will continue to be sold at the same price as before, with no additional costs. Our philosophy is to deliver more value at the most reasonable price, ensuring that anyone can enjoy high-quality sound content at a consistent price. :D


Additionally, due to changes in the content submission process and advancements in technology on Fab, we are considering offering package files for both Unreal Engine and Unity, along with .mp3 or .wav audio files. Thank you for your continued support, and stay tuned for more exciting developments from us! :D


🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.


The Animal Sound Effects Pack is a comprehensive audio package encompassing a variety of animal sounds. This pack is crafted with meticulous detail, providing a range of sounds from different animal categories for use in games, movies, and animation projects.


🕹️Functionality.


  • Diverse Animal Sounds: The pack includes sounds from various animals such as birds, cats, chickens, cows, dogs, donkeys, ducks, frogs, goats, geese, horses, owls, peacocks, pigs, sheep, swans, turkeys, and more.
  • Suitable for Games, Movies, Animation Projects: The pack is optimized for use in various projects.
  • Mono Files: All audio files are provided in mono format.


📂FILES.

  • Birds 37
  • Cat 35
  • Chicken 26
  • Cow 15
  • Dog 50
  • Donkey 14
  • Duck 18
  • Frog 5
  • Goat 11
  • Goose 31
  • Gosling 7
  • Horse 57
  • Owl 9
  • Peacock 3
  • Pig 25
  • Sheep 12
  • Swan 21
  • Turkey 17




⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 392
  • Number of Audio Cues: 392
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0.3 ~ 0.5 dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
